subject: Class Not found error during the execution of JUNITS

messageBody:
Hi,

I m supposed to evaluate the JCOVERAGE.. I m able to compile classes instrument them as well as compile the test cases .. but during the execution of the JUNITS it throws CLASS NOT FOUND ERROR as it is unable to locate a particular class though it is present in my classpath


can anyone please help me ?
